# PostOrdersRequestSession

If externalSessionId or sessionId is provided and an existing session exists, it will be updated with the new data. Otherwise, a new session will be created.

## Properties

Name | Type | Description | Notes
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
**expiresInMinutes** | **number** | Time in minutes for checkout session expiration | [optional] [default to 30]
**checkoutUrl** | **string** | Checkout URL for redirection | [optional] [default to undefined]
**sessionId** | **string** | ID generated by our service to identify the checkout session | [optional] [default to undefined]
**externalSessionId** | **string** | Checkout session ID generated by the client side. The ID must be unique for each cart session | [optional] [default to undefined]

## Example

```typescript
import { PostOrdersRequestSession } from 'payconductor-sdk';

const instance: PostOrdersRequestSession = {
    expiresInMinutes,
    checkoutUrl,
    sessionId,
    externalSessionId,
};
```
